# Adley Enterprises LLC - Full LLM Context

## Business Summary
Adley Enterprises LLC is a fiberglass-only boat repair and refinishing shop based in Melrose, Minnesota. The team also manufactures adjustable transducer mounting boards in-house for fishing electronics setups. The company serves Central Minnesota communities within roughly 30 miles, including St. Cloud, Sauk Rapids, Waite Park, St. Joseph, Sauk Centre, Cold Spring, Long Prairie, Albany, Paynesville, and Richmond.

## Contact
- Business: Adley Enterprises LLC
- Address: 16 Industry Parkway NW, Melrose, MN 56352, US
- Phone: +1 (320) 726-0822
- Email: sales@adleyenterprises.com
- Hours: Monday-Thursday 6:30 AM-4:00 PM, Friday by appointment, closed major holidays

## Core Services
### Fiberglass Boat Repair
Structural and cosmetic fiberglass repair for cracked, chipped, gouged, or stressed areas on fiberglass boats.

### Hull Collision Repair
Impact and collision repair workflows including fiberglass reconstruction, fairing, and finish blending.

### Gel Coat and Exterior Painting
Gel coat touch-up and fiberglass exterior refinishing designed to restore protection and appearance.

### Dent and Scratch Repair
Correction of dents, chips, and scratches with controlled blending for finish-ready results.

### Buffing and Waxing
Protective finishing work to restore gloss and help preserve fiberglass surfaces.

## Product Line
### Adjustable Transducer Mounts
Adley manufactures American-made adjustable transducer mounting boards in Melrose, MN.

- Single Adjustable Transducer Board: $91.00
- Dual Transducer Board - Port Side: $175.50
- Dual Transducer Board - Starboard Side: $175.50
- Shipping: Free in the USA
- Returns: 30 days (see product page policy details)

## Estimating and Intake
- Estimate options: phone call, photo review, and in-person inspection
- Turnaround: varies by repair scope and damage severity
- Specialty: fiberglass only (no aluminum boat repair)
